body:
This is not an issue of net package. See the following:
- https://www.freebsd.org/cgi/man.cgi?connect, <q>... and the only address from which datagrams are to be received.</q> 
- http://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man2/connect.2.html, <q>... and the only address from which datagrams are received.</q>
- https://godoc.org/net#DialUDP, <q>DialUDP connects to the remote address...</q>
